name: Demon Hunt
description:
Description:

The world has ended. Demons are running rampant on the earth and human life as we know it is being governed by demons and overruled by the Demon King. You play as Aria, a half human and half demon hybrid. The Demon King feels threatened by Aria as he believes that she will be his undoing. He has kidnaped 5 people that are the closest to Aria. You as the player must traverse this hellscape and save Aria’s dearest. Beat 5 different levels, all the while collecting different weapons that will help you thwart the Demon King in the final level.

Features:

  • -A demon hunter on a mission
  • -6 levels to explore and rescue the bachelor in distress
  • -Collect loot while traversing the levels
  • -You can jump really high. Most likely due to the wings on your back
  • -Attack while mid jump
  • -One ugly boss to fight on the final level

Release Date:

13th of November 2019

Plaform:

PC Windows XP
